title: Delhi High Court asks MEA to issue order for legal representation of Celina Jaitly's brother in UAE
content: According to ANI, the Delhi High Court has directed the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) to issue an official order appointing a legal firm to represent actor Celina Jaitly’s brother, Major (Retd.) Vikrant Kumar Jaitly, who has been detained in the UAE since September 2024. The court also asked the MEA to ensure that the process is completed at the earliest and to file an affidavit if there are any issues in issuing the order. The matter was heard by Justice Purushaindra Kumar Kaurav, who observed that legal representation should be provided if Vikrant Jaitly has no objection to the law firm suggested for his case. The next hearing in the matter has been scheduled for February 10. As per details shared in court, the law firm proposed by Celina Jaitly’s counsel has offered to represent Vikrant Jaitly on a pro bono basis in both Dubai and Abu Dhabi. The counsel also informed the court that the firm has already gathered the necessary information required to move ahead with the case. The court also noted that the suggested legal firm was among the options earlier proposed by Vikrant Jaitly himself. Celina Jaitly has been seeking support for her brother’s case for several months. The latest direction by the court is expected to facilitate legal representation and further progress in the matter. title: 4 saat dənizdə üzüb ailəsini xilas etdi -
content: Avstraliyada 13 yaşlı Ostin Appelbi güclü küləyin açıq dənizə çəkib apardığı anası, iki qardaşı və bacısını xilas etmək üçün 4 saat dalğalı sularda üzməli olub. “Qafqazinfo” BBC-yə istinadən xəbər verir ki, hadisə Avstraliya sahillərində baş verib. Belə ki, yeniyetmənin ailəsi Qərbi Avstraliya sahillərində qayıq sürərkən güclü külək onları açıq dənizə çəkib aparıb. Əvvəlcə yeniyetmə kömək çağırmaq üçün öz qayığı ilə sahilə qayıtmaq istəyib. Lakin qəflətən onun qayığı su ilə dolmağa başlayıb. Bu zaman oğlan öz gücü ilə 4 kilometr üzməyə qərar verib. İlk 2 saatı o, xilasedici jiletlə, daha sonra isə jiletsiz üzməli olub. Sahilə çatdıqdan sonra daha 2 km məsafə qaçaraq baş verənlər barədə məlumat verə bilib. Yerli vaxtla saat 18:00-da axtarış-xilasetmə əməliyyatı təşkil olunub. 2,5 saatdan sonra oğlanın itkin düşmüş qohumlarını tapmaq mümkün olub. Ailə üzvlərinin hamısı xilasedici jiletdə olub, bu da onlara xilas olmağa imkan verib. Maraqlıdır ki, Ostin bu hadisədən bir neçə saat əvvəl üzgüçülük imtahanından keçə bilməyib.

Sopir Truk Terjepit Usai Tabrakan Beruntun di Mangkubumi Tasikmalaya, Bermula dari Pecah Ban
content: Laporan wartawan TribunPriangan.com, Jaenal Abidin TRIBUNJABAR.ID, TASIKMALAYA - Dua kendaraan mengalami kecelakaan hingga menyebabkan korban luka yang terjadi di Jalan Gubernur Swaka tepatnya dekat SPBU Kecamatan Mangkubumi , Kota Tasikmalaya , Rabu (4/2/2026). Untuk kejadian kecelakaan sekira pukul 18.30 WIB antara kendaraan jenis truk bernopol R 8179 CR dengan kendaraan sejenis truk TNKB E 8064 AT. Truk bermuatan kosong sempat membanting stir ke sebelah kanan karena mengalami trobel pada ban belakang, kemudian di jalur yang sama ada truk warna biru melaju dengan kencang dan tak bisa dikendalikan hingga menabrak bagian belakang. Dalam kejadian ini dua Orang mengalami luka-luka, 1 orang telah dievakuasi dan 1 orang sempat terjepit hingga akhirnya bisa dievakuasi dalam keadaan selamat. "Pada saat saya lewat ada letusan ban kendaraan di depan pecah dan membanting ke sebelah kanan, sehingga yang belakang tidak bisa mengendalikan arus laju hingga menabrak bagian belakang," ucap saksi kejadian Epi Mulyana dikonfirmasi TribunPriangam.com, Pria yang menjabat sebagai Kepala UPTD PPA ini menambahkan, saat kejadian dirinya langsung menghubungi pihak laka lantas untuk memberikan penanganan. "Pada saat kejadian saya juga kaget dan menghubungi lakalantas 119 untuk menyikapi proses lakalantas tersebut," jelas Epi. Epi menuturkan, korban jiwa tidak ada tapi ada korban luka dan sudah diberikan penanganan medis. "Yang di kendaraan ini dua orang dan satu lagi tidak apa-apa, hanya satu orang pengemudi sempat terjepit oleh ekor kendaraan depan dan sekarang sudah berhasil dievakuasi dalam keadaan selamat," ungkap Epi. Menurutnya, ketika kejadian tidak hujan tapi jalan masih basah karena sempat diguyur hujan dari tadi sore. "Kejadian sekira habis magrib, jam 18.30 kurang lebih, mungkin karena jalan masih basah usai diguyur hujan, jadi kedua mobil tidak bisa mengendalikan kendaraannya," kata Epi.(*)

title: Braga: Amigo assume que a faca era sua mas que a entregou a Manu antes de irem para o Bar Académico
content: O amigo que acompanhava Manu, jovem de 19 anos morto junto ao Bar Académico da Universidade do Minho, em Braga, assumiu hoje ser sua a faca do crime, mas que a entregou à vítima antes de se deslocarem para o local. Na segunda sessão do julgamento do homicídio cometido na madrugada de 12 de abril de 2025, que decorre no Tribunal de Braga, a testemunha, Rodrigo Mendes, contou que levou de sua casa uma faca a pedido do amigo, por este ter “receio” de que algo de mal lhe acontecesse, uma vez que estaria a receber ameaças de alguém que também iria marcar presença na mesma festa no estabelecimento de diversão noturna.Na versão hoje apresentada, que difere de testemunhos já anteriormente prestados, ainda na fase de inquérito, o jovem, de 19 anos, disse que antes de rumarem ao bar, ele, a vítima e mais amigos encontraram-se num centro comercial da cidade e que aí entregou ao amigo a faca de cozinha, com cerca de 10 centímetros e com um cabo branco de plástico.Já no interior do Bar Académico, onde chegaram pelas 00:00, a testemunha contou ter visto a vítima a confrontar um grupo que estaria a “minar (drogar)” o copo da bebida de uma amiga, acrescentando que, nessa sequência, interveio um segurança, o qual decidiu expulsar o amigo, após terem também discutido.Ficaram à espera de boleiaO jovem, que seguiu o amigo para o exterior do espaço de diversão noturna, cerca das 03:30, explicou que ambos ficaram à espera da boleia de um outro colega, mas que como este nunca mais chegava, a vítima decidiu chamar a PSP por se sentir injustiçado por ter sido expulso do bar, quando alertava para o facto de estarem a tentar colocar droga na bebida de uma amiga.A polícia dirigiu-se ao local e abandonou o espaço pouco tempo depois, permanecendo ambos no exterior do bar, “à conversa”.A testemunha relatou ao tribunal que, cerca das 05:30, viu o arguido e outros cinco amigos deste a saírem do bar e, nesse momento, o amigo “confrontou-os e abordou o grupo por terem feito aquilo”, em alusão ao facto de, alegadamente, colocarem droga na bebida da amiga.Ato contínuo, contou, “começaram a atirar pedras e garrafas” contra ele e o amigo, acrescentando que o arguido, que se encontrava uns metros à frente do restante grupo que o acompanhava, “tinha na mão uma garrafa partida”.O jovem referiu que, de um momento para o outro, no meio daquela “confusão e pânico”, quando se tentava defender, o amigo “desapareceu”, deixando-o de o ver.Pouco depois, disse, ele...

title: AP News Summary at 10:35 a.m. EST
content: Trump's border czar says 700 immigration officers to leave Minnesota immediately MINNEAPOLIS (AP) — President Donald Trump's border czar says the number of immigration enforcement officers in Minnesota will be reduced after state and local officials agreed to cooperate by turning over arrested immigrants. Tom Homan says about 700 federal agents will be immediately withdrawn from the operation in Minnesota. That's about a quarter of the federal officers currently deployed in the state. Homan said last week that the government could reduce the number of federal officers in Minnesota, but only if local officials cooperate. His comments came after Trump seemed to signal a willingness to ease tensions in Minneapolis and St. Paul.

title: Champion Insights Officially Opens Enrollment to Investigate ALS Risk in High-Performance Athletes, Military Members, and First Responders
content: Ambitious nationwide study will enroll 500 participants to examine genetic, biological, and environmental factors linked to elevated ALS risk. NEW ORLEANS , Feb. 4, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- Champion Insights officially commenced active research operations today in its nationwide study investigating why elite athletes, military veterans, and high-performance populations, like first responders, face disproportionately high rates — potentially up to twice as likely compared to the general population — of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS). The initiative is enrolling up to 500 participants on an ongoing basis and operates nationwide with no single physical site; participants contribute from their homes through an in-home blood collection service and online clinical surveys. Champion Insights is designed to uncover biological signals that may explain increased vulnerability in these groups by analyzing genetic factors, such as those related to intense physical activity and lipid metabolism, alongside lifestyle and environmental influences. Findings from this research could not only help answer the long-standing question of increased risk, but also inform broader breakthroughs for the entire ALS community by identifying new biomarkers and potential therapeutic targets. Former NFL player and renowned ALS advocate Steve Gleason , founder of Answer ALS and Team Gleason, is Participant #1, providing his sample collected at home to initiate the study. He will be joined by an initial cohort of high-performing individuals and prominent ALS champions, who have already committed to participating, including: Matt Bellina (retired U.S. Navy Lt. Commander) Kerry Goode (former NFL player, founder Goode Foundation) Tim Green (former NFL player, founder Tackle ALS) Andrea Lytle Peet (elite long-distance runner and Team Drea founder) Johnny Rodriguez (athlete and coach, founder Athletes vs. ALS) Eric Stevens (former NFL player and fire fighter, founder axeALS) Participants will contribute samples through the ALS Therapy Development Institute's (ALS TDI) ALS Research Collaborative. "Ten years ago, we set out to build the most comprehensive, open ALS research effort ever, and together, we made it happen," Gleason said. "Now we're taking the next big step with Champion Insights, and I'm honored to be the first participant. By making it possible for high-performing athletes, veterans, and first responders, who face ALS at significantly higher rates, to contribute remotely from home,...

title: "On arrive vraiment au bout du bout" : intimidations verbales de parents envers des animatrices, cantine fermée à l'école de Traînou
content: De "l'intimidation verbale" de la part de parents d'élèves. Voilà à quoi ont été confrontées des animatrices de la pause méridienne (du midi) de l'école élémentaire de Traînou. Choquées, elles ont décidé "de passer par la case gendarmerie", comme l'explique le maire de la ville, Aymeric Pépion. Avant, le lundi 2 février, de décider d'exercer leur droit de retrait. Ce qui a pour conséquence la fermeture du service de restauration scolaire jeudi 5 février."Aucun accueil périscolaire ne sera assuré sur la pause méridienne au sein de l'école également", ajoute la mairie de Traînou. Les enfants seront donc à la charge des parents de 11 h 30 à 13 h 20.Aymeric Pépion revient sur cet incident, qui s'est déroulé la semaine dernière."Des familles sont venues directement trouver les animateurs de la pause méridienne pour avoir certaines explications. Aujourd'hui, nous avons des familles de plus en plus compliquées qui n'acceptent pas que leurs enfants aient un cadre lors de la pause méridienne. Il peut y avoir des règles appliquées qui ne sont peut-être pas les mêmes qu'à la maison."Les agents concernés ont digéré l'événement pendant le week-end du 31 janvier-1er février, "soutenus par la municipalité". "Et à la réunion du lundi 2 février, ils m'ont dit qu'ils voulaient marquer le coup et utiliser leur droit de retrait pour ne plus que cela se reproduise", souligne le maire.Résultat : pas de cantine le jeudi 5 février. Sous le post Facebook de la mairie, de nombreux parents ont réagi, comme ce papa qui a signé "Un parent d'élève dans la mouise pour jeudi mais qui les soutient (les agents)."Ou un autre, un peu plus virulent : "C'est une honte ! Encore une fois, c'est la société tout entière qui paye pour l'incivilité de quelques-uns...""Il y a des limites à ne pas franchir"Le maire Aymeric Pépion répond : "Effectivement, on fait des généralités d'une minorité. Le problème est que cette minorité met le bazar. C'est malheureux. On arrive à un moment où les agents font leur travail. On a le droit de ne pas être d'accord mais on n'a pas le droit de s'en prendre directement à eux. Il y a des limites à ne pas franchir. Et là, elles ont été franchies.""(Pour jeudi midi), nous n'avons plus assez de personnel pour accueillir tous les enfants, donc nous fermons le restaurant scolaire des deux côtés, maternelle et élémentaire. Quoi qu'il arrive, cela n'aurait pas été juste de remplacer les...

title: Major movie theater chain suddenly shutters multiple locations
content: I remember what it was like going to the movies back in the day. Watching a movie at a theater was more of an adventure than entertainment. The theater enables you to fully immerse yourself in the story, to cry or laugh with the characters, enjoy the music, and just fully forget about the everyday struggles for about two hours. It’s a wonderful experience.
creator: nina zdinjak
